name: retrieveConnection
description: Retrieves the high-level details of an existing connection. To retrieve specific authentication information, use the endpoint for the specific connection type.

$ul: **anchorsite_override**: `Latency` directs Telnyx to route media through the site with the lowest round-trip time to the user's connection. Telnyx calculates this time using ICMP ping messages. This can be disabled by specifying a site to handle all media. (default: Latency)
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
**outbound_voice_profile_id**: Identifies the associated outbound voice profile.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
**webhook_api_version**: Determines which webhook format will be used, Telnyx API v1 or v2. (default: 1)
**webhook_event_failover_url**: The failover URL where webhooks related to this connection will be sent if sending to the primary URL fails. (default: )
**webhook_event_url**: The URL where webhooks related to this connection will be sent. (default: null)
